page.title: Waterproofing, High Pressure Grouting, Epoxy Grouting
page.description: Distributor of waterproofing, concrete repair, gypsum and sealant materials such as Bostik, Knauf, Yoshino, Boral, Fibrin, Gripset, Shinetsu & Star Series

section1.title: Waterproofing
section1.content: Used to protect concrete structures from being penetrated by water causing further concrete deterioration and leakages.

table1.title: A. Waterproofing by Crystallisation for Concrete
content: Waterproofing Crystallisation by intergral
Waterproofing Crystallisation by coating
Pre-Applied Waterproof Membrane

table2.title: B. Waterproofing Cement-Based by Coating
content: Flexible Cementitious Waterproofing
Rigid cement-based two-component alkali reactive polymer modified waterproofing
2-Component flexible cementitious waterproofing

table3.title: C. Adhesive Waterproofing Membrane
content: Attactic polypropylene modified bituminous membrane
Bitumen membrane with adhesives in rolled form
Cold applied membrane produced from rubber bitumen and cross laminated high density polyethylene
Cold applied and self adhesive membrane with 100 micron cross laminated HDPE film and rubber bitumen compound
Heavy duty waterproofing membrane incorporating high strength, heat resistant mesh embedded in a layer of self adhesive rubber bitumen

table4.title: D. Waterproofing Membrane by Coating
content: Liquid Waterproof Membrane, Top Coat, Primers, PU Based and Detailing Products
Polyurethane-based liquid applied waterproofing membrane
Flexible acrylic waterproofing membrane

table5.title: E. Planter System / Green Roof
content: Waterproofing membranes on green roof applications

section2.title: High Pressure Grouting
section2.content: Used to repair active water leakages in concretes (tunnels, basements roof decks, bathroom x pool decks)

table6.title: A. Leakages on : Basement / GWT / STP, Bathroom, Balcony, Roof Deck, Pool
content: One component rigid closed cell polyurethane injection resin
One component semi flexible closed cell polyurethane injection resin
Red non-flammable, phthalate free liquid to be used with HA CUT PUs
Super eXtrafast Catalyst to be used with HA CUT PUs

table7.title: B. Soil Injection and Geogrouting
content: One component polyurethane injection resin for binding loose soil
High strength, rigid, fast curing polyurethane resins
Non foaming organo-mineral injection resin
High expansion organo-mineral injection resin

table8.title: C. Failed Expansion Joints/Movement Joints
content: Hydrophilic MDI based polyurethane injection resin
One component hydrophobic flexible closed cell polyurethane injection resins
Two component, low viscosity, hydrophobic, flexible, non foaming polyurethane injection resin

table9.title: High Pressure Injection Accessories
content: Diaphragm pump for injecting PU/Epoxy Material into Concrete (Up to 200 bar / 2900 Psi)
Manual pump for injection PU/Epoxy Material into Concrete (Up to 100 bar / 1450 Psi)

section3.title: Epoxy Grouting
section3.content: Used to restore the integrity of cracked and honeycombed concrete structures

table10.title: DRY : Roof deck / Retaining Wall / Basement Floor

table11.title: DRY & WET : Roof deck / Retaining Wall / Basement Floor
